name: Holiday Hussle
description:
Deliver Gifts. Make Cash!

  • Collect Gifts from above.
  • Controller**/WASD to guide Drone. 
  • Button 1**/[Space] to release Gift.
  • Gift must be well on the platform to confirm delivery.
  • Excessive strain on cables may cause them to snap!
  • Easy money ain't always easy to find:

** = WIN Only; other OSs will emulate Controller.

Credits:

  • Code: Virtual Nomad
  • Pixelwork: BlinkOk
  • Graphics: Craftpix.net, Kenney, Death's Darling, Svetlana Kushnariova
  • Music: DeltaBreaker
  • Sound: AGK Sound Library, Freesound.org
